akn:section.akn:heading: Limitation on State income taxation of certain pension income

akn:content.akn:p: (a) No State may impose an income tax on any retirement income of an individual who is not a resident or domiciliary of such State (as determined under the laws of such State).

(e) 11 So in original. No subsecs. (c) and (d) have been enacted. Nothing in this section shall be construed as having any effect on the application of section 514 of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
